name: SkeDun: The Fallen Tomb
description:
This is a small dungeon crawler featuring a dungeon full of loot, secret areas and a really tough boss battle at the end. Can you defeat him? The first version of SkeDun was made in 48 Hours as a challenge, by this time the game isn't on the state I think it deserve despite this MVP being okay, more updates will be coming soon.

SkeDun stands for Skeleton Dungeon, a game where the player is an skeleton, kinda subversive, hmm?

How to Play:

WASD - Movement

Hold down left mouse button - Hit

M - Mute all sound

Made by Portal Software on Construct 3.

The Soundtrack used were not not composed by me, no rights about its intellectual properties.
